SELECT A.ID, A.ACT_ID, B.ACT_NAME, DATE_FORMAT( C.CREATE_DATE, '%Y/%m/%d %h:%i:%s' ) CREATE_DATE, A.RESULT FROM ACTIVE_TASK_RESULT A LEFT JOIN BPM_ACT_MODEL B ON A.ACT_MOD = B.ACT_MOD LEFT JOIN VBPM_ACT C ON A.ACT_ID = C.ACT_ID where 1 = 1
A.ACT_ID = #ACT_ID#
B.ACT_NAME like CONCAT('%',#ACT_NAME#,'%')
A.RESULT = #RESULT#
C.CREATE_DATE >= #START_DATE#
C.CREATE_DATE <= #END_DATE#
ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC LIMIT #pro_mysql#,#page_record#
